objects.text:
• Digital LED Control Panel
• Multiple Wash Cycles
• Energy-Efficient Design
• Smart Water Management

product_details.name: Insignia Smart Front Load Washer - Modern Laundry Excellence
product_details.description:
• Digital LED Display with Intuitive Controls & Program Selection
• Multiple Wash Cycles Including Express, Delay, and Temperature Settings
• Large Capacity Front-Loading Design with Clear View Door
• Energy-Efficient Operation with Smart Water Management
• Sleek White Finish with Modern Black Accent Door
• Easy-to-Use Control Dial with Multiple Program Options
• Digital Timer Display for Precise Cycle Tracking
• Compact Yet Spacious Design Perfect for Modern Homes
• Anti-Vibration System with Stabilizing Feet
• User-Friendly Interface with Clear Program Indicators
• Customizable Wash Settings for Different Fabric Types
• Premium Build Quality with Durable Components

banner_details:
This promotional banner is split into four vibrant quadrants that balance bold typography and clear visual hierarchy. The top half promotes urgency with headings (`heading`, `tagline`) in modern uppercase fonts emphasizing a flash sale and limited-time offer. The left side highlights product details (`subheading`, `description`, `urgency_text`) with a mid-century inspired sans-serif and bullet points, emphasizing key features of a washer. The right side retains focus on the product image and pricing, with bold red pricing text (`price`) and a subtle original price (`original_price`). A strong red call-to-action button (`cta_button`, `cta`) encourages immediate engagement. Decorative semi-transparent shapes and diagonal lines enhance dynamism.

**Color Palette:**
- Sky Blue: `#B3E5FC`
- Light Sky Blue: `#E1F5FE`
- Coral Red: `#FF5252`
- Light Pink: `#FFCDD2`
- Deep Red: `#D32F2F`
- Blue: `#0277BD`
- Grey: `#757575`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image showcases a modern Insignia front-load washer with a sleek and minimalistic color palette that can be reflected in the advertisement banner. The dominant color is a clean white (#FFFFFF), giving it a sense of purity and modernity. Accents of deep black (#1C1C1C) around the drum provide bold contrast and highlight the central focus area. The control panel features subtle gray (#A9A9A9) text and details, with a touch of chrome/silver (#C0C0C0) on the dial, enhancing the premium feel. The digital display uses a vibrant electric blue (#00BFFF) for visibility. The color blending achieves both clarity and sophistication, ideal for promoting cleanliness and advanced technology.
